channel.title: Bruce Lu's pages
channel.description: Recent content on Bruce Lu's pages

item.title: How I built a Web Site on Github by Using Hugo within an hour
item.description: Local env. macOS Mojave Hugo v0.55.6 for Mac git version 2.20.1 (client) Prepare local env. Install Hugo brew install hugo Install git client brew install git On Github Log on Github Create a public repository named bruce-lu.github.io Where bruce-lu is my Github account name. I create a new repository bruce-lu.github.io on Github. On local env. Create workspace mkdir ~/ws && cd ~/ws

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
